titleStmt.title: Letter from Tomasita Autobus to Santos Barros, January 6, 1942
Carta de Tomasita Autobus a Santos Barros, 6 de enero, 1942
titleStmt.author: Autobus, Tomasita

publicationStmt.authority: Family Letters: An analysis of the Personal Correspondence of a Mexican American Family in Western Colorado and Eastern Nebraska in the First Half of the 20th Century

distributor.name: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

bibl.author: Tomasita Autobus
bibl.title: Letter from Tomasita Autobus to Santos Barros

pb.facs: L41 to Santos Baros January 6, 1942 PDF ONLY.pdf

opener.salute: Just a few lines to say hello and when this letter reaches your hands I hope it will find yow in the best of health, as this [letter] leaves me just fine, except for a harmless cold.

div1.p: Well kid I promised to write to you soon, well here it is, although I dont know exactly what to write

Say kid if yow go to work some where dont forget to write to me & give me your new address, but just the same dont forget to answer any of my letters Gee did I wish you could come and visit me some time?

Did yow finally go to the show on Sunday? I didnt see you but I thought I saw Lupe I wasn’t sure though and Saturday night I was over in Lupton too and I saw your brother & some other guy’s, I as just going in the house when I saw him pass up by Amedy’s house & stay By the way tell yow mother hello & Lupe & Jennie if yow get to see them and I know yow will see your mother Ha! Ha!

closer.salute: Well I better close I’m making rather a newspaper than a letter well so Long and answer soon Love

div1.postscript: P.S. and I do mean answer soon
